text: Hu'neanagi Poli'a ati vahe'mokizmi ke nona'a amanage huno zamasmi'ne. Zamagra rama'a vahe zamufi knare ke agafa e'orine'za havige zante tahenaze, tagranena Romu mopa agafa vahe mani'nonanagi, kinafi tavare'za emerante'naze. Hagi menina oku'a hurantenaku nehazo? Tamage anara osu'tfa hugahaze! Zamagra'zmi e'za eme tavare megi tatregahaze.
